page.title: 18CHANGING TIMES IN DEANS AREA
page.content: { 1945 1965 1985 { SCHOOLS SCHOOLS SCHOOLS Only 1 1 Primary 4 Primaries Primary (new one) 1 Community High School {SHOPS SHOPS SHOPS Owner and Mini Markets Shopping assistants. Self service centre. Counter Supermarket service. Self service { FASHION FASHION FASHION Plain Mini skirts. Comfortable Knee length Pointed shoes.Spiky hair Rationing Hair long and Hair curly straight {TRANSPORT TRANSPORT TRANSPORT Few cars, Ordinary people Holidays mostly owned cars. abroad. Doctors' Railways closed Motorways People travel Stations by plane. opening up again.
